Monthly electricity export and of accordance Accuracy class manufacturers the meters is 0.2 annually specifications. import are measured at 225 kV substation by PP and CIE as confirmed during the remote interview/physical site visit. The electricity supplied to grid is calculated by subtracting Electricity export to grid and Electricity import from grid. The measurement method is in accordance with the registered VCS-PD /05/. Frequency monitoring/recording Continuous recording measurement and at least monthly The electricity export and import are continuously measured and monthly recorded in the form of the monthly reports /15/ as verified during the remote interview/physical site visit. The frequency of monitoring/recording is in accordance with the registered VCS-PD /05/. Value monitored Verification team has verified the reported electricity export/import data with the 767,555 | 744,251 | 1,509,806 monthly electricity reports /15/ and found consistent.
